The researcher, the Almighty, is up to you: Well for you, then the first, then the first for you, the first one said, Qatadah, the dog, and the fighting: And Abu Jahl said: “With what thing do you threaten?Do not be able to do nothing, and you will do nothing, and I will not be the most dear people His saying is for you in a meaning and a night for you, and it is a supplication to him that he will follow what he hates.Others said: The meaning: the guardian of you once, after that, and the locks said: This carries his faces: one of them: that it is a blessed Eid from God for the disbelievers.And the second: It is something that the Prophet said ﷺ to his enemy, so the enemy of God disgraced him to his pride when he himself, so God Almighty is like that.And the third: that this be an order from God to His Prophet, by saying it to the enemy of God, and the meaning will be: Then he went to his family, he will be stained [33] For you, the first warning, for you have come close to you, what you have not accepted for you from the deceased.His Excellency said: What is the human being to leave a dam, that is: an important, neither command or end, and it is not charged in the world and is not held accountable for his work in the last, and the waters Black, I have been hidden.And know that he was upset when he mentioned in the beginning of the Surah - his saying, which is the human being, will we not collect his bones in the end of the surah, and he mentioned in the validity of the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who is the one who is the one who was the one who was the one who is the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who was the one who is the one who was the one.His saying is that the human being is to leave a bond, and his counterpart is saying that the hour is coming to almost hide it to reward every soul with what you seek [Taha: 15] We make those who believe and do righteous deeds like spoils in the land, or do we make the righteous like the workers and its acknowledgment: that giving the ability, the machine and the mind And the matter of obedience and forbidding the corrupt requires that it be satisfied with the fans of the verbs, and that is not worthy of its rule, so if it is not necessary, then it is not necessary.It is not appropriate for the merciful generous unless there is a house of reward, resurrection and resurrection.(P-207)
